NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

We act on behalf of Adresseavison ASA.

As required of the Digital Millenium Copyright Act, we are instructed to place you on notice that:

http://www.adressa.no/multimedia/archive/00625/hundefoerer_volden_625068.jpg

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the infringing material. 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described, above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification, is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Should you require any further in formation regarding this mater, please contact me at the address or email address indicated,  below. 

Very truly yours 

TAPPER & CO ADVOKATFIRMA DA
